TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WindowsIdentity extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable, class System.Security.Principal.IIdentity
Public Class WindowsIdentity Inherits ClaimsIdentity Implements IDeserializationCallback, IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class WindowsIdentity : System::Security::Claims::ClaimsIdentity, IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 表示 Windows 使用者。

span.span: Represents a Windows user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法來建立物件，代表目前的使用者。Call the method to create a object that represents the current user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用成員的類別。The following example shows the use of members of class. 如需範例示範如何取得 Windows 帳戶語彙基元，透過呼叫 unmanaged 的 Win32`LogonUser`函式，然後使用該權杖來模擬其他使用者時，請參閱類別。For an example showing how to obtain a Windows account token through a call to the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and use that token to impersonate another user, see the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`Negotiate`| ||`Normal`| ||`false`| > [!NOTE] > 您可以擷取語彙基元所代表`userToken`藉由呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼，例如 Win32 API`LogonUser`函式。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Win32 API `LogonUser` function. 永遠發行`userToken`藉由呼叫 Win32 API`CloseHandle`函式。Always release `userToken` by calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` function. 如需有關呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md).

-or-

span.span: is duplicated and invalid for impersonation.

span.span: The caller does not have the correct permissions.
-or-
A Win32 error occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string sUserPrincipalName) cil managed

param.name: sUserPrincipalName

span.span: The UPN for the user on whose behalf the code is running.

summary.span: 為指定使用者主要名稱 (UPN) 所表示的使用者，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified User Principal Name (UPN).

remarks.format: ## Remarks UPN 格式*username*@*domainname*.com，換句話說，電子郵件地址。A UPN has the format *username*@*domainname*.com, in other words, an email address. 中的 UPN 識別`sUserPrincipalName`用來擷取該使用者已透過 Win32 API 的語彙基元`LsaLogonUser`函式。The UPN identified in `sUserPrincipalName` is used to retrieve a token for that user through the Win32 API `LsaLogonUser` function. 接著該權杖用來識別使用者。In turn that token is used to identify the user. 因為無法使用所提供的 UPN 登入，可能會傳回例外狀況。An exception might be returned due to the inability to log on using the supplied UPN. > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式適用於僅限電腦加入 Windows Server 2003 或更新版本的網域。This constructor is intended for use only on computers joined to Windows Server 2003 or later domains. 例外狀況會擲回先前的網域類型。An exception is thrown for earlier domain types. 這項限制是因為，這個建構函式會使用[KERB_S4U_LOGON 結構](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533)，其中是第一個 Windows Server 2003 中引進。This restriction is due to the fact that this constructor uses the [KERB_S4U_LOGON structure](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533), which was first introduced in Windows Server 2003.

exception.span: Windows 會傳回 Windows NT 狀態碼 STATUS_ACCESS_DENIED。

span.span: Windows returned the Windows NT status code STATUS_ACCESS_DENIED.

-or-

-or-

span.span: The user is not a member of the domain the computer is attached to.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token and the specified authentication type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`Normal`| ||`false`| 值`type`參數用來設定參數。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果`type`是`null`，安全性系統組至`Negotiate`Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 作業系統，以及上`Kerberos`較早版本的 Windows 作業系統上。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全性系統未使用此值。它是僅供內部使用。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. > [!NOTE] > 您可以擷取語彙基元所代表`userToken`藉由呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼，例如 Win32 API`LogonUser`函式。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Win32 API `LogonUser` function. 永遠發行`userToken`藉由呼叫 Win32 API`CloseHandle`函式。Always release `userToken` by calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` function. 如需有關呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用建構函式建立的新執行個體類別指定的 Windows 帳戶語彙基元和指定的驗證類型所表示的使用者。The following code shows the use of the constructor to create a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token and the specified authentication type. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`type`參數用來設定參數。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果`type`是`null`，安全性系統組至`Negotiate`Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 作業系統，以及上`Kerberos`較早版本的 Windows 作業系統上。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全性系統未使用此值。它是僅供內部使用。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. 中的 UPN 識別`sUserPrincipalName`用來擷取該使用者已透過 Win32 API 的語彙基元`LsaLogonUser`函式。The UPN identified in `sUserPrincipalName` is used to retrieve a token for that user through the Win32 API `LsaLogonUser` function. 接著該權杖用來識別使用者。In turn that token is used to identify the user. 因為無法使用所提供的 UPN 登入，可能會傳回例外狀況。An exception might be returned due to the inability to log on using the supplied UPN. > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式適用於僅限電腦加入 Windows Server 2003 或更新版本的網域。This constructor is intended for use only on computers joined to Windows Server 2003 or later domains. 例外狀況會擲回先前的網域類型。An exception is thrown for earlier domain types. 這項限制是因為，這個建構函式會使用[KERB_S4U_LOGON 結構](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533)，其中是第一個 Windows Server 2003 中引進。This restriction is due to the fact that this constructor uses the [KERB_S4U_LOGON structure](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533), which was first introduced in Windows Server 2003.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| 值`type`參數用來設定參數。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果`type`是`null`，安全性系統組至`Negotiate`Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 作業系統，以及上`Kerberos`較早版本的 Windows 作業系統上。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全性系統未使用此值。它是僅供內部使用。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. > [!NOTE] > 您可以擷取語彙基元所代表`userToken`藉由呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼，例如 Win32 API`LogonUser`函式。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Win32 API `LogonUser` function. 永遠發行`userToken`藉由呼叫 Win32 API`CloseHandle`函式。Always release `userToken` by calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` function. 如需有關呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用建構函式建立的新執行個體類別所指定的 Windows 帳戶語彙基元、 指定的驗證類型和指定的 Windows 帳戶類型表示的使用者。The following code shows the use of the constructor to create a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token, the specified authentication type, and the specified Windows account type. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 為指定 Windows 帳戶語彙基元、指定驗證類型、指定 Windows 帳戶類型和指定驗證狀態所代表的使用者，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token, the specified authentication type, the specified Windows account type, and the specified authentication status.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`type`參數用來設定參數。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果`type`是`null`，安全性系統組至`Negotiate`Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 作業系統，以及上`Kerberos`較早版本的 Windows 作業系統上。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全性系統未使用此值。它是僅供內部使用。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. 您可以擷取語彙基元所代表`userToken`藉由呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼，例如 Win32 API`LogonUser`函式。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Win32 API `LogonUser` function. 永遠發行`userToken`藉由呼叫 Win32 API`CloseHandle`函式。Always release `userToken` by calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` function. 如需有關呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用建構函式建立的新執行個體所指定的 Windows 帳戶語彙基元、 指定的驗證類型、 指定的 Windows 帳戶類型，表示使用者的類別和指定的驗證狀態。The following code shows the use of the constructor to create a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token, the specified authentication type, the specified Windows account type, and the specified authentication status. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#17)]

summary.span: 取得用來識別使用者的驗證類型。

span.span: The type of authentication used to identify the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性做為參考資訊。它不是由安全性系統。This property is informational; it is not used by the security system. 在 Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 作業系統中，這個屬性的預設值是`Negotiate`，從中進行選擇最佳的安全性支援提供者 (SSP) 根據客戶設定安全性原則。On Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, the default value for this property is `Negotiate`, which chooses the best security support provider (SSP) based on customer-configured security policy. 舊版的 Windows 作業系統的預設屬性值是`Kerberos`。The default property value for earlier versions of the Windows operating system is `Kerberos`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity GetAnonymous() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetAnonymous () As WindowsIdentity

summary.span: 傳回可在程式碼中用來做為代表匿名使用者之 Sentinel 值的 物件。

span.span: Returns a object that you can use as a sentinel value in your code to represent an anonymous user.

summary.span: 屬性值不代表 Windows 作業系統所使用的內建匿名識別。

span.span: The property value does not represent the built-in anonymous identity used by the Windows operating system.
An object that represents an anonymous user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回空物件，可讓您將作業視為匿名。This property returns an empty object that enables you to treat operations as anonymous. 屬性值未對應到 Windows 的匿名使用者，也不能進行模擬。The property value does not correspond to a Windows anonymous user and cannot be used for impersonation. 此外，請注意這個屬性所傳回的身分識別不是靜態的。每次呼叫傳回不同的匿名識別。Also, note that the identity returned by this property is not static; each call to returns a different anonymous identity. 您可以使用偵測的傳回值的屬性。You can use the property to detect the return value from . 不過，偵測到 Windows 的匿名識別，這個方法所傳回的匿名識別。However, detects both the Windows anonymous identity and the anonymous identity returned by this method. 若要使用的第二個身分識別，快取傳回值，而不是依賴屬性。To use the latter identity, cache the return value instead of relying on the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法以傳回物件，表示匿名 Windows 使用者。The following code shows the use of the method to return a object that represents an anonymous Windows user. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity GetCurrent(bool ifImpersonating) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCurrent (ifImpersonating As Boolean) As WindowsIdentity

param.name: ifImpersonating
param.span: 表示只有當執行緒目前正在模擬時才會傳回 ； 則表示如果執行緒目前正在模擬時，會傳回執行緒的 ，或執行緒目前不是正在模擬時，則會傳回處理程序的 。

span.span: to return the only if the thread is currently impersonating; to return the of the thread if it is impersonating or the of the process if the thread is not currently impersonating.

summary.span: 傳回表示執行緒或處理程序之 Windows 識別的 物件，視 參數的值而定。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the Windows identity for either the thread or the process, depending on the value of the parameter.

returns.span: 物件，表示 Windows 使用者。

span.span: An object that represents a Windows user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ifImpersonating`是`true`和執行緒沒有模擬，傳回物件沒有任何值。If `ifImpersonating` is `true` and the thread is not impersonating, the returned object has no value. 如果`ifImpersonating`是`false`和執行緒正在模擬、執行緒會傳回。If `ifImpersonating` is `false` and the thread is impersonating, the for the thread is returned. 如果`ifImpersonating`是`false`和執行緒不模擬、程序會傳回。If `ifImpersonating` is `false` and the thread is not impersonating, the for the process is returned.

span.span: for ability to manipulate the principal object.
Associated enumeration: .

param.name: desiredAccess

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 使用指定所要的語彙基元存取層級，傳回代表目前 Windows 使用者的 物件。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the current Windows user, using the specified desired token access level.

returns.span: 物件，表示目前的使用者。

span.span: An object that represents the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `desiredAccess`參數指定之識別的存取權的存取權杖的要求的類型的存取遮罩。The `desiredAccess` parameter specifies an access mask that identifies the requested types of access to the access token. 這些要求的存取類型會與權杖的判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 來判斷哪些類型的存取權授與或拒絕比較。These requested access types are compared with the token's discretionary access control list (DACL) to determine which types of access are granted or denied.

span.span: for ability to manipulate the principal object.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext Impersonate() cil managed
Public Overridable Function Impersonate () As WindowsImpersonationContext

summary.span: 模擬由 物件所代表的使用者。

span.span: Impersonates the user represented by the object.

returns.span: 物件，表示模擬前的 Windows 使用者，這個物件可以用來還原為原始使用者的內容。

span.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this can be used to revert to the original user's context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows NT 平台上，目前的使用者必須擁有足夠的權限以允許模擬。On Windows NT platforms, the current user must have sufficient rights to allow impersonation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得 Windows 帳戶語彙基元，藉由呼叫 unmanaged 的 Win32`LogonUser`函式，以及如何使用該權杖來模擬另一位使用者，然後還原成原始身分識別。The following example demonstrates how to obtain a Windows account token by calling the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and how to use that token to impersonate another user and then revert to the original identity. [!code-cpp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 匿名識別會嘗試執行模擬。

span.span: An anonymous identity attempted to perform an impersonation.
A Win32 error occurred.

para.span: Microsoft Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me) 平台不需要的使用者語彙基元，因為模擬不能使用這些平台上的位置。

span.span: Because Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me) platforms do not have user tokens, impersonation cannot take place on those platforms.

para.span: 在使用後，請務必呼叫結束模擬的方法。

span.span: After using , it is important to call the method to end the impersonation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext Impersonate(native int userToken) cil managed
Public Shared Function Impersonate (userToken As IntPtr) As WindowsImpersonationContext

param.name: userToken
param.span: Windows 帳戶語彙基元的控制代碼。

span.span: The handle of a Windows account token.

param.span: 這個語彙基元通常是透過呼叫 Unmanaged 程式碼所擷取的，例如對 Win32 API 函式的呼叫。

span.span: This token is usually retrieved through a call to unmanaged code, such as a call to the Win32 API function.

summary.span: 模擬由指定使用者語彙基元所表示的使用者。

span.span: Impersonates the user represented by the specified user token.

returns.span: 物件，表示模擬前的 Windows 使用者，這個物件可以用來還原為原始使用者的內容。

span.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this object can be used to revert to the original user's context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows NT 平台上，目前的使用者必須擁有足夠的權限以允許模擬。On Windows NT platforms, the current user must have sufficient rights to allow impersonation. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫方法`userToken`值相當於呼叫 Win32`RevertToSelf`函式。Calling the method with a `userToken` value of is equivalent to calling the Win32 `RevertToSelf` function. 如果目前正被模擬另一位使用者，控制會還原至原始使用者。If another user is currently being impersonated, control reverts to the original user. 如需呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information about calls to unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得 Windows 帳戶語彙基元，藉由呼叫 unmanaged 的 Win32`LogonUser`函式，以及如何使用該權杖來模擬另一位使用者，然後還原成原始身分識別。The following example demonstrates how to obtain a Windows account token by calling the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and how to use that token to impersonate another user and then revert to the original identity. [!code-csharp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/windowsidentity impersonation2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsIdentity Impersonation2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/windowsidentity impersonation2/vb/source.vb#1)]

There is insufficient memory available.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsAnonymous As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsAnonymous { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出使用者帳戶是否已經由系統識別為匿名帳戶。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the user account is identified as an anonymous account by the system.

value.span: 如果使用者帳戶是匿名帳戶，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the user account is an anonymous account; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會偵測 Windows 匿名身分識別和所傳回的匿名識別方法。The property detects both the Windows anonymous identity and the anonymous identity that is returned by the method. 匿名帳戶通常僅只會從內發生 ASP.NET 應用程式時由網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 允許匿名存取。Anonymous accounts are typically only encountered only from within ASP.NET-based applications when anonymous access is allowed by Internet Information Services (IIS). ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用偵測使用者帳戶是否已經由系統識別為匿名帳戶的屬性。The following code shows the use of the property to detect whether the user account is identified as an anonymous account by the system. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Owner As SecurityIdentifier

summary.span: 取得語彙基元擁有人的安全識別項 (SID)。

span.span: Gets the security identifier (SID) for the token owner.

value.span: 語彙基元擁有人的物件。

span.span: An object for the token owner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SID 唯一識別使用者或群組對所有 Windows NT 實作。The SID uniquely identifies a user or group on all Windows NT implementations. 傳回的 SID 識別預設擁有者將會套用至新建立之物件的 SID。The returned SID identifies the default owner SID that will be applied to newly created objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性顯示的安全性識別元的語彙基元擁有人。The following code example shows the use of the property to display the security identifier for the token owner. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

summary.span: 以模擬的 Windows 身分識別執行指定的動作。

span.span: Runs the specified action as the impersonated Windows identity.

summary.span: 您可以使用 並提供您的函式做為參數，而不需要使用個人化的方法呼叫並在 中執行您的函式。

span.span: Instead of using an impersonated method call and running your function in , you can use and provide your function directly as a parameter.

span.span: Sets the object with the logical context information needed to recreate an instance of this execution context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會設定以邏輯呼叫內容資訊。This method sets a with the logical call context information. 還原序列化期間的執行內容的物件重新組成從資料流上傳輸。During deserialization, the execution context object is reconstituted from the transmitted over the stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Token As IntPtr
public: virtual property IntPtr Token { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用者的 Windows 帳戶的語彙基元。

span.span: Gets the Windows account token for the user.

value.span: 與目前所執行的執行緒相關聯的存取語彙基元控制代碼。

span.span: The handle of the access token associated with the current execution thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿明確釋放所傳回的帳戶語彙基元屬性。Do not explicitly release the account token that is returned by the property. 語彙基元釋放方法，您可以在程式碼中呼叫。The token is released by the method, which you can call in code. 也會自動由記憶體回收行程呼叫。 is also automatically called by the garbage collector. > [!NOTE] > 所傳回的帳戶語彙基元屬性是用來建立 Windows 權杖的複本物件，並由.NET Framework 就會自動釋放。The account token that is returned by the property is a duplicate of the Windows token that is used to create the object and is automatically released by the .NET Framework. 這是不同的帳戶語彙基元 (`userToken`參數的建構函式)，用來建立物件。This is different from the account token (the `userToken` parameter for the constructor), which is used to create the object. `userToken` 是呼叫所建立的 Windows 帳戶語彙基元`LogonUser`和必須關閉，以避免記憶體流失。`userToken` is a Windows account token that is created by a call to `LogonUser` and must be closed to avoid a memory leak. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用屬性來取得使用者的 Windows 帳戶語彙基元。The following code shows the use of the property to get the Windows account token for the user. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#14)]

span.span: for the ability to access unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property User As SecurityIdentifier

summary.span: 取得使用者的安全識別項 (SID)。

span.span: Gets the security identifier (SID) for the user.
An object for the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SID 唯一識別使用者或群組對所有 Windows NT 實作。The SID uniquely identifies a user or group on all Windows NT implementations. > [!NOTE] > 所傳回物件方法不是與 Windows 的匿名使用者相同。The object returned by the method is not the same as the Windows anonymous user. 這個屬性會取得`null`由匿名使用者所傳回物件方法; 它不會取得代表匿名 Windows 使用者的 SID。This property gets `null` for an anonymous user represented by the object returned by the method; it does not get the SID representing an anonymous Windows user.
